answerText: white dwarf[10] The violent onset of fusion in the core of a white dwarf undergoing a type Ia supernova is a "detonation" named for this element. Two atoms of this element will fuse to form a magnesium nucleus, which then splits apart.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 7 | 16 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: If these objects can slowly accrete mass from a binary companion, they can undergo type Ia supernovae. [10] Name this type of star that is supported against collapse by electron degeneracy pressure. The upper bound of their mass is given by the Chandrasekhar limit.
